mapper.select: SELECT p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.parent_id, p.permission_type, p.permission_key, p.component, p.path, p.icon, p.order_num, p.status, p.visible, p.cache, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.order_num, p.permission_id
